description:
An add-on for ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN.
This set contains the following:

Playable Aircraft: CFA-44 Nosferatu
A next-generation carrier-based stealth fighter optimized for solo raids.
Nicknamed Nosferatu (meaning undying), its acceleration and mobility far outclass other fighters.
Equipped with versatile weaponry, this aircraft is formidable against both air and ground targets.
This set also includes 7 skins, including the special Strigon skin, and the new special weapon ADMM.

This aircraft can equip the ADMM, EML, or IEWS as its special weapon.
name: ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN - CFA-44 Nosferatu Set
